K

Key - Class in PlayerCharacteristics
Create a new body for the player to collect in the game in order to progress through the different levels
Key(World) - Constructor for class PlayerCharacteristics.Key
Constructor method to initialise base class for the keys, assigning and rendering the image and shape of the key in the game world
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class PlayerCharacteristics.characterMovement
Function that will record the actions made by the player when pressing a specific key, providing the controls for the character body
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class PlayerCharacteristics.characterMovement
Function that registers when the action of keys being released during the course of the game, stopping the player's movement in the view upon release.
